overview: When Marshal Tianpeng, who was in charge of the 100,000 sailors of the Tianhe River, met the fairy Nishang who could not love, Tianpeng was willing to offend the heaven and was eventually banished to the mortal world. Tianpeng and Nishang were destined to kill each other forever. When the cowardly Zhu Gangjiao grabbed the nine-toothed nail rake, he would change his life for love and fight with the heavens
title: Pig Demon
